Title: Finding Competitor Products on Xiaohongshu
Content: To find competitor products on Xiaohongshu, start by searching for the product category you are interested in, such as 'underwear'. Use the search bar and sort the results by sales volume to identify popular items. Focus on individual or small stores rather than large brands, as these are more comparable to your own store. Additionally, use filters to view the most recent and hottest products. This will give you a comprehensive view of what is currently trending. By analyzing these products, you can identify successful strategies and apply them to your own listings. Look at the product descriptions, images, and customer reviews to understand what makes these products popular.

Title: Analyzing Best-Selling Products
Content: To analyze best-selling products on Xiaohongshu, start by examining the sales data and customer reviews. Products with sales over 1,000 units are generally good indicators of popularity, but even products with lower sales can be valuable if they are new or niche items. Look at the product's listing details, including the images, descriptions, and hashtags used. Check the associated posts and notes to see how frequently the product is mentioned and the type of engagement it receives. This analysis will help you understand the factors contributing to the product's success, such as pricing, presentation, and customer feedback. Use this information to refine your own product listings and marketing strategies.

Title: Identifying Suitable Brands and Products
Content: To identify suitable brands and products on Xiaohongshu, use specific keywords related to your product category. Search for these keywords and analyze the results based on sales volume and engagement. Look for products that have recently gained popularity and check their associated posts for customer feedback. This will help you identify trends and potential gaps in the market. Additionally, use the platform's recommendation features, such as 'You May Like', to discover related products and brands. By continuously monitoring these trends and analyzing the data, you can identify suitable products and brands to include in your store, ensuring they meet the preferences and demands of your target audience.
